# sortOrder

**Instance Property**

How overlapping particles are sorted before rendering. Defaults to `increasingDepth`.

## Declaration

```swift
var sortOrder: ParticleEmitterComponent.ParticleEmitter.SortOrder
```
title: sortOrder
